about_the_game:
The official original video game soundtrack for Archmage Rises, written & composed by James Marantette. Title Track written by George A Sanger & James Marantette, produced by The Fat Man, George A Sanger. Contains over 30 fantasy & medieval-style ambient musical tracks with more on the way!
Lossless WAV files are also included.
detailed_description:
The official original video game soundtrack for Archmage Rises, written & composed by James Marantette. Title Track written by George A Sanger & James Marantette, produced by The Fat Man, George A Sanger. Contains over 30 fantasy & medieval-style ambient musical tracks with more on the way!
Lossless WAV files are also included.

name: Archmage Rises Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 270 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 1300 MB available space
